sentence.text: BAB4878 is a female diagnosed soon after birth with DRS.
At birth she weighed 3.26 kg (18%); length 49.5 cm (17%); OFC 34.3 cm (40%).
She was born with a ventricular septal defect (VSD) surgical repaired.
As a child she presented with recurrent urinary tract infections with urinary reflux and gastroesophageal reflux, and recurrent otitis media (ear tubes).
At age 1 year she weighed 8 kg (4%); height 71.1 cm (17%); OFC 48cm (98%).
She started having breathing problems that got worse with age and she needed continuous positive airway pressure (CPAP) during sleep.
She recently had a surgery to correct her prognathism and correct her airway passage with great success.
It is noteworthy that she has an IQ of 160.
